desc: Warther Cutlery is one of the premier knife companies in the United States. Our handmade kitchen cutlery is made from premium-grade S45VN steel.

layout.text: At the age of five Ernest “Mooney” Warther found his first pocketknife and began whittling. As a teenager he began carving in walnut wood and bone. He became frustrated with store-bought knives because they would not stay sharp, so he began to design and make his own...
